author: gartung
body:
Utilities/StaticAnalyzers: Update function dumper to not add virtual at the end of function calls.
Change category of some checks to deprecated "Deprecated API"

#### PR description:

The addition of virtual at the end of the function call printout was causing 
`function 'cms::CkfTrackCandidateMaker::produce(edm::Event &, const edm::EventSetup &)' calls function 'cms::CkfTrackCandidateMakerBase::produceBase(edm::Event &, const edm::EventSetup &) virtual'
function `

to not be linked to 

`function 'cms::CkfTrackCandidateMakerBase::produceBase(edm::Event &, const edm::EventSetup &)' calls function 'edm::eventsetup::EventSetupRecord::get<class edm::ESHandle<class TrackerGeometry>>(class edm::ESHandle<class TrackerGeometry> &) const'`

This prevented the call stack from being reported in the ESR::get() report.
title: Utilities/StaticAnalyzers: Update function dumper to not add virtual at the end of function calls
